description: A SQL file in a release.

^(sheet_sha256)$.description: The SHA256 hash value of the sheet content or the statement.

enableGhost.description: Whether to use gh-ost for online schema migration.

id.description: The unique identifier for the file.

path.description: The path of the file. e.g., `2.2/V0001_create_table.sql`.

sheet.description:
The sheet that holds the content.
 Format: projects/{project}/sheets/{sheet}
sheet.title:
For inputs, we must either use `sheet` or `statement`.
 For outputs, we always use `sheet`. `statement` is the preview of the sheet content.

sheetSha256.description: The SHA256 hash value of the sheet content or the statement.

statementSize.description: The size of the statement in bytes.

version.description: The version identifier for the file.
